author: convexityjunkie
content:
Hi all, I built a toy project to demonstrate allowing blob senders to specify pre-execution blob tips

Would love to hear your opinions

https://github.com/lu-bann/blob-middleware

author: bridge-bot
content:

In particular L2 tx statuses and their drfinitions.
